  "oldString": "## Customizing the ACM

The ACM (`.ai/README.md`) controls:
- Change budgets
- Safety protocols
- Quality standards
- Re-run rules

Modify these sections as needed for your organization:

```markdown
## Change Budget Policy
[Adjust limits per agent type]

## Safety Protocols
[Add organization-specific rules]

## Quality Standards
[Define your code quality requirements]
``
